alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 3:22AM MST until December 17 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...Through noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow may significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while travelling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
